Class CardsController

java.lang.Object
org.example.galaxy_trucker.Controller.Controller
org.example.galaxy_trucker.Controller.CardsController
public class CardsController extends Controller
The CardsController class extends the abstract Controller class, responsible for managing the game actions and states related to the player's interaction with card-based mechanics. It defines the specific transitions and updates needed for this phase of the game.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    CardsController(Player curPlayer, String gameId, boolean disconnected)
    Constructs a CardsController instance to manage the card-related mechanics for a specific player in the game, identified by the provided game ID.

  • Constructor Details

    • CardsController

      public CardsController(Player curPlayer, String gameId, boolean disconnected)
      Constructs a CardsController instance to manage the card-related mechanics for a specific player in the game, identified by the provided game ID.
      Parameters:
      curPlayer - the current player interacting with the card mechanics
      gameId - the unique identifier of the game session
      disconnected - indicates whether the player is currently disconnected

  • Method Details

    • nextState

      public void nextState(GameController gc)
      Transitions the game to the next state based on the current player's actions and the status of the card stack. If the card stack is empty, the game will end. Otherwise, it initializes a new FlightController to handle the next phase of the game.
      Specified by:
      nextState in class Controller
      Parameters:
      gc - The GameController instance that manages the overall game flow and state transitions.
